examples.korean: We all received the same dignity and we call this fundamental dignity. 발음듣기 우리 모두는 동등한 존엄성을 받았으며 우리는 이것을 기본권(본진절인 존엄성)이라 부른다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. sonaldo(sona****) Web Collection
examples.english: We all received the same dignity and we call this fundamental dignity. 발음

examples.korean: Phillips was a volunteer with Project Hope, a Canada-based group. 발음듣기 필립은 캐나다에 본진을 둔 호프 프로젝트의 자원봉사자였다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. BABA(blue****) Web Collection
examples.english: Phillips was a volunteer with Project Hope, a Canada-based group. 발음

examples.korean: Warwick's navy is done! Concentrate on the main base. 발음듣기 워릭의 함대는 끝났다! 이제 본진 공격에 집중하라. hansemEUG
examples.english: Warwick's navy is done! Concentrate on the main base. 발음

examples.korean: When Flag Touch Return is enabled you may return your flag to the base by touching it. 발음듣기 깃발 복귀 설정이 켜져 있으면 소속된 팀의 깃발을 건드려서 본진으로 복귀시킬 수 있습니다. hansemEUG
examples.english: When Flag Touch Return is enabled you may return your flag to the base by touching it. 발음

examples.korean: When Flag At Home To Score is enabled you cannot score a point unless your flag is safely on its flag stand. 발음듣기 아군 깃발 본진에 있어야 득점 설정이 켜져 있으면 아군 깃발이 깃대에 안전하게 꽂혀있을 경우에만 득점할 수 있습니다. hansemEUG
examples.english: When Flag At Home To Score is enabled you cannot score a point unless your flag is safely on its flag stand. 발음
